attributes.action: create awareness about Arnold chiari malformation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like to ask our prime minister to create awareness about Arnold chiari malformation neither medical staff or the department of work and pensions has enough knowledge about this condition to treat, help or support people like myself, 

this is a very painful condition causing many disabling symptoms which can be permanent 

the operation for this condition does NOT cure our condition, it can help but it can make you more disabled which unfortunately has happened to me and apart from friends and family there is no support 

please help us in our fight to create more awareness, so others do not have to suffer alone
thank you

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "create awareness about Arnold chiari malformation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19491


Prime Minister's Office
